sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A brief relation of the surprise of the forts of Weymouth, the siege of Melcombe, the recovery of the forts, and raising of the siege. / By P.J. minister to the garrison. Ince, Peter, b. 1614 or 1615.
8 p.
printed for Luke Fawne, at the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1644. [i.e. 1645]
P.J. = Peter Ince. Thomason catalogue lists under 1645. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Peeter Innse"; "March 20th"; "ye guift of Cap: ffawne". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
A brief relation of the surprise of the forts of Weymouth, the siege of Melcombe, the recovery of the forts, and raising of the siege. / By P.J. minister to the garrison. Ince, Peter, b. 1614 or 1615.
8 p.
printed for Luke Fawne, at the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard., London, : 1644. [i.e. 1645]
P.J. = Peter Ince. Thomason catalogue lists under 1645. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Peeter Innse"; "March 20th"; "ye guift of Cap: ffawne". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Luke Fawne
the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard.
>>>>>>> imprintparse
